allowedParameters.name: q
allowedParameters.description: This field specifies the query used to limit the orders returns. Defaults to RQL. To use SCIM use the queryFormat parameter

allowedParameters.name: countOnly
allowedParameters.description: Only return the count of orders for the current profile.

allowedParameters.name: limit
allowedParameters.description: Specifies the number of orders to be retrieved starting from offset. In case this is not present, the complete list of orders for the profile is returned.

allowedParameters.name: sort
allowedParameters.description: This field specifies the sort order of the list to be fetched.

allowedParameters.name: X-CCOrganization
allowedParameters.description: Current organization context of the logged in user
